cnbc.summary: Palo Alto Networks surpassed Wall Street's fiscal fourth-quarter estimates and issued upbeat guidance.

cnbc.title: California legislature passes bill that gives interest on insurance payouts to homeowners
cnbc.summary: The bill, which would apply to both existing insurance payouts and to any new escrow accounts, heads to Gov. Gavin Newsom's desk for his signature.

cnbc.title: Musk's Starlink suffers apparent outage as SpaceX launches more satellites
cnbc.summary: Elon Musk's aerospace and defense contractor also successfully launched a fresh group of satellites to bolster its Starlink network.

cnbc.title: When 'invest like the 1%' fails: How Yieldstreet's real estate bets left customers with massive losses
cnbc.summary: Customers of the private markets startup Yieldstreet said they face huge losses on real estate investments that turned out to be far riskier than they thought.

cnbc.title: Novo Nordisk offers diabetes drug Ozempic for less than half the price for cash-paying U.S. patients
cnbc.summary: Patients can pay $499 in cash per month for three dose sizes of Ozempic through the company's direct-to-consumer pharmacy and GoodRx, among other platforms.

cnbc.title: OpenAI's Altman warns the U.S. is underestimating China's next-gen AI threat
cnbc.summary: Despite escalating U.S. export controls on semiconductors, Altman is unconvinced that the policy is keeping up with technical reality.

cnbc.title: Versant to rename MSNBC, drop famed peacock logos in Comcast separation
cnbc.summary: They're the first real public-facing changes in Versant's upcoming separation from Comcast's NBCUniversal.

cnbc.title: Tesla Optimus rival Unitree shines at the 'World Humanoid Robot Games' in China
cnbc.summary: Humanoid robot athletes competed in dance battles, martial arts, track and field and soccer.

cnbc.title: How retail accounting could distort profitability as tariffs take effect
cnbc.summary: As Home Depot, Target and Walmart prepare to report earnings, retail inventory method accounting could change how tariffs affect their profitability.

cnbc.title: 'Job hugging' has replaced job-hopping, consultants say, as workers cling to current roles
cnbc.summary: Workers are clinging to their jobs as they sour on their prospects in the labor market.
